MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: Win95,Win98,WinME,Windows2000,WinXP,Windows2003,Windows Vista Starter,Windows Vista Home Basic,Windows Vista Home Premium,Windows Vista Business,Windows Vista Enterprise,Windows Vista Ultimate,Windows Vista Home Basic x64,Windows Vista Home Premium x64,Windows Vista Business x64,Windows Vista Enterprise x64,Windows Vista Ultimate x64,Unix,Linux,Linux Console,Linux Gnome,Linux GPL,Linux Open Source,Mac PPC,Mac OS 9,Mac OS X,Mac OS X 10.1,Mac OS X 10.2,Mac OS X 10.3,Mac OS X 10.4,Mac OS X 10.5,Mac Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Added support for new indenter and two new languages

English.Keywords: universal GUI, GUI, indent, indenter, beautify, beautifier, format, formatter, GNU Indent, Astyle, Artistic Styler, BCPP, GreatCode, Uncrustify
English.Char_Desc_80: UniversalIndentGUI is a graphical ui (gui) for multiple source code indenters.
English.Char_Desc_250: UniversalIndentGUI is a cross platform compatible graphical ui (gui) for several code formatter, beautifier and indenter like GreatCode, AStyle (Artistic Styler), GNU Indent, BCPP and so on. (Latest news on http://universalindent.sourceforge.net)
English.Char_Desc_450: UniversalIndentGUI is a cross platform compatible GUI for several code formatter, beautifier and indenter like GreatCode, AStyle (Artistic Styler), GNU Indent, BCPP and so on. Main feature is a live preview to directly see how the selected formatting option affects the source code. (Latest version, news and complete changelog on http://universalindent.sourceforge.net)
English.Char_Desc_2000: UniversalIndentGUI is a cross platform compatible GUI for several code formatter, beautifier and indenter like GreatCode, AStyle (Artistic Styler), GNU Indent, BCPP and so on. Main feature is a live preview to directly see how the selected formatting option affects the source code. (Latest version, news and complete changelog on http://universalindent.sourceforge.net)

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: You may use, distribute and copy the UniversalIndentGUI under the terms of the GNU General Public License version 2.
